t: THE HISTORY OF SEALY MATTRESSES | BEDPLANET
s: July 2, 2021 - America’s #1 Mattress Brand for Hundreds of Years It all started in Sealy, TX in 1881. Sealy was started by a cotton gin builder, Daniel Haynes, when he started making cotton-filled mattresses for friends. In 1889, he invented the machine that compressed cotton.
